title: Hour 2 – Bruce Gradkowski (07-09-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 – Bruce Gradkowski (07-09-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Chris Broussard and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they talked about NFL players who take less money in order to win and if this is the correct approach. They also discuss Kawhi Leonard’s health heading into the NBA playoffs and if the Clippers should be worried about playing back to backs. Plus, former NFL QB Bruce Gradkowski joins the show to tell the guys if Patrick Mahomes is worth the $500 million extension he got from the Chiefs.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
